arts.ttl: Bournemouth's Andoni Iraola faces touchline ban after mix-up with referee
arts.sum: Bournemouth head coach Andoni Iraola is facing a touchline ban following a "misunderstanding" in Saturday's 3-0 defeat to Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot makes Martin Zubimendi admission after Liverpool's failed summer move
arts.sum: Liverpool boss Arne Slot drops hint over the club's future transfer plans for Real Sociedad midfielder Martin Zubimendi.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot hails Liverpool's £25m transfer decision after Bournemouth win
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot talks up the importance of the Reds keeping goalkeeper Caoimhin Kelleher after their 3-0 victory over Bournemouth in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 3-0 Bournemouth: Player ratings as Reds go top of Premier League
arts.sum: And that let-off only prompted Liverpool to start piling on the pressure, with Diaz, Mohamed Salah and Nunez all forcing Kepa Arrizabalaga into sharp saves in quick succession. CB: Ibrahima Konate - 7/10 - Cracked the game open with a ball over the top for Diaz and played a key role in stemming Bournemouth's attacking threat.

arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola facing touchline ban after referee mix-up
arts.sum: The manager was shown a yellow card in the game against Liverpool and will miss Bournemouth’s next match

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold sets incredible Liverpool record in Bournemouth thrashing
arts.sum: Liverpool survived an early scare before recording a comfortable victory over Bournemouth at Anfield with Trent Alexander-Arnold involved in the Reds' second goal

arts.ttl: Darwin Nunez scores stunner after Luis Diaz’s brace in Liverpool’s routine win
arts.sum: The striker has now netted four goals in his last three games against the Cherries.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 3-0 Bournemouth: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Reds go top
arts.sum: Liverpool surge to the top of the Premier League table with a convincing 3-0 win over Bournemouth at Anfield, as Luis Diaz bags a brace.

arts.ttl: Liverpool v Bournemouth: FPL team news + predicted line-ups
arts.sum: Team form, absentees and our predicted XIs The post Liverpool v Bournemouth: FPL team news + predicted line-ups appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth boss Andoni Iraola throws down gauntlet to in-form star Antoine Semenyo
arts.sum: Antoine Semenyo has been one of Bournemouth's standout players so far this season after bagging two goals and an assist in their first three fixtures but boss Andoni Iraola believes there is more to come
